018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1SecretList;
024import io.kubernetes.client.util.Watch.Response;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver.ResponseType;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
031import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.DisplayPasswordChanged;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.GetDisplayPassword;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
036import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
037
038/**
039 * Watches for changes of display secrets.
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
042public class DisplayPasswordMonitor
043        extends AbstractMonitor<V1Secret, V1SecretList, VmChannel> {
044
045    /**
046     * Instantiates a new display secrets monitor.
047     *
048     * @param componentChannel the component channel
049     */
050    public DisplayPasswordMonitor(Channel componentChannel) {
051        super(componentChannel, V1Secret.class, V1SecretList.class);
052        context(K8sV1SecretStub.CONTEXT);
053        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
054        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
055            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET);
056        options(options);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    protected void prepareMonitoring() throws IOException, ApiException {
061        client(new K8sClient());
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    protected void handleChange(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change) {
066        String vmName = change.object.getMetadata().getLabels()
067            .get("app.kubernetes.io/instance");
068        if (vmName == null) {
069            return;
070        }
071        var channel = channel(vmName).orElse(null);
072        if (channel == null || channel.vmDefinition() == null) {
073            return;
074        }
075        channel.pipeline().fire(new DisplayPasswordChanged(
076            ResponseType.valueOf(change.type), change.object), channel);
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * On get display secrets.
081     *
082     * @param event the event
083     * @param channel the channel
084     * @throws ApiException the api exception
085     */
086    @Handler
087    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
088    public void onGetDisplaySecrets(GetDisplayPassword event, VmChannel channel)
089            throws ApiException {
090        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
091        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
092            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
093            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + event.vmName());
094        var stubs = K8sV1SecretStub.list(client(), namespace(), options);
095        if (stubs.isEmpty()) {
096            return;
097        }
098        stubs.iterator().next().model().map(m -> m.getData())
099            .map(m -> m.get("display-password"))
100            .ifPresent(p -> event.setResult(new String(p)));
101    }
102}
